name: Tony Williams
text: My car got stolen they was rude told me I couldn't pick it up after 4 and before 9 they are the rudest people I've met

name: Keri Northcutt
text: I will recommend this company to any and everyone who needs a tow. They were extremely friendly. Was told on the phone that the tow should be at my location within 25 minutes, they got there in about 15. Did I mention they were super friendly? I’m very pleased with the service I received today. I will definitely use them again

name: Tina Mosley
text: They're great I called them around midnight and someone was there in 15 to 20 minutes. They are very friendly. I will use them again when I need a tow.

name: Bethany Cassani
text: What can I say about Mo's Towing? They completely turned a bad situation into a much better one. We are so grateful for Ms. Karen as she orchestrated the help we needed and by the time we left our car's were fixed and we were on the road again. I'm forever in debt to Ms. Karen, her son-n-law, grandson and the man at the Motorbike shop next door. Thank you to all of you for being there and turning our bad day into a great day!

name: Andrew Watson
text: I needed a tow from Fairhope to Lillian and they told me they don’t go that far. Way to lose business

name: private
text:
Signs says they open at 8am. I arrive at 7:50am. No one came at 8am. I waited till 8:30am and called the number. Some rude operator said “your suppose to call ahead of time”! I was not told this when they towed my vehicle from the wreck scene. Finally around 9am someone shows up. If your not going to be at your office don’t post business hours. Put on your business cards to call in advance!

If you don’t want wait on them to show up late and talk down to you then call someone’s else!

name: Joey Burch
text: Took great care of my father in law

resp.text: Our Pleasure! Thank you for your trust and kind comments.

name: Josh Tredenick
text: Quick to respond and quick to pick up your vehicle, polite, professional, and affordable!

name: KATHLEEN CULVER
text: Suck suck suck

name: Harold Reinhart
text: Being a small business owner, I was in need of a tow for my service truck, Matt, answered my call! He was on time, professional, and affordable with no hidden fees. Thanks again Matt, for your quick response, and getting me back on the road!!

resp.text: It was pleasure working with you, Mr. Reinhart.  Thank you for choosing us for your towing service.  Please keep us in mind should the need arise.

name: Mickey lee
text: Fast great service will recommend

name: Jordan Jones
text: Fast response, affordable, and just great local service! Will be using again!

name: Leslie Counterman
text: Nice!! Fast service!! Matt is a great guy who offers fast, reliable service. I would recommend to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the nice review, Ms. Leslie.  Please keep us in mind the next time you may need towing or roadside assistance, and we will try to exceed your expectations!

name: James Kelly
text: Very professional and on time. Great service. I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank You for taking the time to write such a positive review.  We very much appreciate it.

name: Trey Lambeth
text: GREAT PEOPLE, EXCELLENT SERVICE, FIVE STAR TOW COMPANY

resp.text: Thank You for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review!  We very much welcome feedback from our customers and especially appreciate knowing that that they think we are doing a good job!

name: Cayden Snead
text: Nice guy helps when you need him

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review!

name: Eagle Woman
text: Can't find a legitimate address on web or Google maps. They charge way too much.

name: Brandi Fleming
text: Affordable, fast, professional, and friendly. Great service, Thank you

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review!  It is much appreciated.  Please keep us in mind the next time you may need towing or roadside assistance, and we will try to exceed your expectations!

name: Brandon Ruelle
text: Horrible service, truck was there less than 24 hours and they charged me for 2 days and all they had to was too bad it goes by calendar days and didn’t try to work with me at all. Don’t use their towing service!

name: Tray Boyd
text: Wouldn’t take me to my destination, because he wasn’t simply going that way. Unacceptable.

name: joe berrer
text: great service!

name: Jessica robinson
text: Total lack of professionalism
